About

I build beautiful & functional web applications using HTML, Sass, and JavaScript.

I prefer my user interfaces to be functional, quick, efficient, and elegantly + thoughtfully designed.

While originally from Dallas, I currently reside in Austin, Texas. I am currently working remotely creating user interfaces @ Kalkomey.

I have stuff like:

  • a personal mac n' cheese chef (boyfriend)
  • a coffee cup holder (jeep wrangler)
  • a BA in Emerging Media & Communication
